name: IP Geolocation - IPWHOIS.io
description: You can use https://ipwhois.io/ to filter out bot traffic, customize content based on visitor's location, display full country names, perform bulk IP geolocation, and more.

api_methods.name: JSON endpoint
api_methods.description: Detailed information on our website: https://ipwhois.io/documentation

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: {ip} can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address, or none to use the current IP address.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the geolocation details of the IP address 192.168.1.1?
I need to know the location information for the IP 2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334.
What's the geolocation data for the IP address 203.0.113.5?
Could you provide the location details for the IP 2607:f0d0:1002:51::4?
Find the geolocation for the IP address 198.51.100.14.
I want to know the location of the IP 2001:0db8:0000:0042:0000:8a2e:0370:7334.
Can you give me the geolocation information for the IP 192.0.2.146?
Please provide the geolocation details for the IP address 2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7335.
What is the location information for the IP 203.0.113.6?
I'd like to know the geolocation of the IP address 2607:f0d0:1002:51::5.
